items.content_html: json-utility is a software tool or library designed to work with JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) data. JSON is a lightweight, text-based format for data exchange, widely used in web applications and APIs.

items.content_html: A lightweight REST API designed for Minecraft plugins, hosted on Cloudflare Workers, that consolidates Mojang API requests into a single GET request for efficient retrieval of player data, UUIDs, and skins.

items.title: AlbertArakelyan/moment-utc-time: A lightweight package addition to momentjs which can parse any time (not date, time only) into utc and opposite from utc to your local time.

items.title: so1ve/lite-emit: A simple, lightweight, and fast event emitter.

items.content_html: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.
items.title: jsuites/jsuites: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.

items.content_html: A lightweight and modern paste bin and url shortener.
items.title: greenhat616/pastebin: A lightweight and modern paste bin and url shortener.

items.content_html: Livio is a modern social network that connects people to discuss topics of politics, daily life, and culture. With a lightweight and user-friendly design using Astro and React, Livio facilitates meaningful interaction and the exchange of ideas on an accessible platform optimized for dynamic experiences.
items.title: leoneldonati/livio-web: Livio is a modern social network that connects people to discuss topics of politics, daily life, and culture. With a lightweight and user-friendly design using Astro and React, Livio facilitates meaningful interaction and the exchange of ideas on an accessible platform optimized for dynamic experiences.

items.content_html: A lightweight, self-hosted authentication and authorization solution for .NET WebAPI, providing local accounts, role management, and SSO support with minimal setup.
